== MythTV Packages ==

The team will be in charge of actively maintaining the following source packages:

* '''mythtv''': https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/mythtv

* '''mythplugins''': https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/mythplugins

* '''mythtv-themes''': https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/mythtv-themes

Branches for mythtv and mythplugins are available on bzr. See https://code.launchpad.net/people/ubuntu-mythtv/+branches for these branches.

The team has an interest in other packages that are dependencies, or compliment the mythtv suite.
These include:

* '''lirc''':https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/lirc

* '''ivtv''': https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/ivtv

* '''linux-restricted-modules''': https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/linux-restricted-modules-2.6.20
